attributes.action: Tougher sentences, educating the young, and supporting those affected.
attributes.background: Gun and knife crime is at an all time high in the UK. Young lives and families are being destroyed on a daily basis. We need immediate intervention with tougher sentences, education and support. Please help get this into parliament. I am a mother and I can not just sit here and watch this happen...

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

If you would like "An urgent debate on strategies for effectively combating gun and knife crime" you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/216928

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
